law.catch_line: Addition of limited health services -- Notification of disapproval -- Hearing.

text.section:
A limited health service organization may add one (1) or more limited health services by:
Filing the relevant information required by KRS 304.38A-030;
Demonstrating compliance with KRS 304.38A-030 and 304.38A-080; and
Obtaining approval from the commissioner prior to offering the additional limited health service.

If the filings are disapproved, the commissioner shall notify the limited health service organization and shall specify the reasons for disapproval in the notice. The limited health service organization shall have sixty (60) days from the date of receipt of the notice to request a hearing before the commissioner pursuant to KRS 304.2-310.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1519, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 15, effective July 15, 2002.
